game.title: The Lost Amulet
game.objective: Find and return the ancient amulet to the village elder
game.description: According to the legends, the ancient amulet was lost in the Forbidden Forest. The village elder believes its recovery will lift the curse that has been plaguing the village.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and the elder's blessing

task.objective: Speak to Elder Morrim for more information about the amulet
task.description: Elder Morrim might have more information that could aid your search. Head to his hut at the center of the village.

task.objective: Enter the Forbidden Forest and find the amulet
task.description: The forest is dangerous and filled with creatures. Stay alert and find the ancient amulet.

task.objective: Return the amulet to Elder Morrim
task.description: Once you have found the amulet, return it to Elder Morrim in the village. Be careful, the journey back might be just as treacherous.
